children.name: All people in Ethiopia, more specifically those who are left behind, live in a peaceful, just, and democratic society which upholds standards of rule of law, accountability, and human rights
Strengthened institutions, systems and mechanisms to promote peace, prevent conflict, effectively address root causes of conflict and implement post-conflict rehabilitation efforts
Democratic institutions and governance structures strengthened to ensure good and democratic governance practices, electoral integrity, and institutional accountability
Strengthened legal, policy, regulatory and accountability frameworks and institutions at all levels to ensure equitable access to justice and uphold the rule of law
Enhanced capacities of institutions, CSOs and Citizens to promote and protect human rights including through strengthened civic engagement and expanded civic space
National and regional capacity enhanced for the production, analyses and utilization of high-quality data

All people in Ethiopia more specifically the people who are left behind, benefit from inclusive, resilient, and sustainable economic development that prioritizes decent job opportunities, access to nu
Strengthened economic governance, institutional capacity, and macroeconomic management
Strengthened policy, systems, institutional capacity and access to finance, markets and technology to create decent and inclusive jobs
Improved access and adoption of inputs, technologies and practices for the production of nutrient dense food and an inclusive and resilient food system
Enhanced access to affordable and clean energy through increased finance for energy investment, private sector engagement and adoption of diverse new energy technologies
All people in Ethiopia more specifically the people who are left behind, accessed equitable quality social services and protection

National health care system capacities are strengthened to ensure equitable access and utilization of integrated, resilient, and shock-responsive high-quality primary health care services, including p

The National education system’s capacities are strengthened to increase access to inclusive and equitable learning opportunities to out of school and hardest to reach children and adolescents and equi
Strengthen national and sub national capacity towards equitable access to basic, inclusive and climate-resilient WASH services and show intent to practice WASH behaviours

Strengthen national and sub national capacity of systems and communities including those that are left behind towards accessing gender-transformative, climate-resilient and shock-responsive social pro

All people in Ethiopia, more specifically the most vulnerable and those who are left behind, enjoy protection and benefit from enhanced resilience, increased access to climate financing, reduced risks
Strengthened disaster risk management systems and capacities at all levels
Strengthened capacity of government and communities to respond, adapt and be resilient to climate change and environmental shocks
Enhanced sustainable natural resources management
Strengthened capacity of government and other stakeholder for sustainable management of urbanization and human settlements
Improved Access to Climate Finance for Ethiopia's Long-Term Low Emission and Climate Resilient Development Strategy (2020-2050)

framework.name: Gender Equality and the Empowerment of Women and Young People

children.name: All women and young people including adolescent girls in Ethiopia, particularly those left behind, enjoyed equitable opportunities and are empowered to participate fully in all aspects of society, lea
Strengthened mechanisms and capacities of communities and institutions to address discriminatory gender and social norms, to prevent and respond to all forms of gender-based violence including sexual
Increased participation and representation of women, young people and other marginalized groups including adolescent girls in the multi-sectoral decision-making process
Policy, institutional accountability including financing frameworks strengthened to promote gender equality and the empowerment of women and young people
